channel.title: Autocomplete in v29
channel.description:
I have 3 autocomplete texts triggered by !!. I can see them all in MacOS, but in iPadOS on my iPad Mini I can only see 1 and a bit of them. If I try to scroll them or hide the keyboard they disappear.
I am interested to know how many entries of the autocomplete list you can see in iPadOS on which sized screen devices.
Thanks
